packages.name: linux-image-amd64
packages.summary: Patches privilege escalation flaws in io_uring and updates LSM hooks for hardened sandboxing.

packages.name: openssl
packages.summary: Fixes a timing leak in constant-time modular exponentiation and refreshes TLS cipher defaults.

packages.name: tmux
packages.summary: Adds pane zoom presets and improves Wayland clipboard synchronisation for nested sessions.
